name: Russian Cars: 10 in City
description:
Russian Cars: 10 in City - is a real physics engine game.
Ever wanted to try a car simulator and city driving?
Now you can drive, drift and feel a muscle car for free!
Accurate physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing fun possible.

****GAME FEATURES****
- Real dynamic game feeling with endless fun.
- 3D garage.
- New Сity.
- Easy controller.
- Realistic acceleration.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Accurate physics.
